channel.title: Password Manager on Contre
channel.description: Recent content in Password Manager on Contre

item.title: Getting started with GnuPG
item.description: GnuPG is a complete and free implementation of the OpenPGP standard and this is just part 0 of who knows how many series where I will explain my basic understanding of GPG and how useful is on my daily basis. If you wish to understand more in detail how GPG work please refer to the RFC or here is a great post that captures the essence of it quite deeply.
